subject: Football
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Magnetic resonance imaging tests taken Friday on Dallas linebacker DeMarcus Ware and running back Marion Barber revealed no significant damage after they were injured in the Cowboys’ victory over Seattle on Thursday. Ware sustained a hyperextended left knee and Barber a dislocated fifth toe on his right foot. ¶John Abraham, the Falcons’ three-time Pro Bowl defensive end, said he would play Sunday against San Diego despite sustaining a mild concussion in last week’s win over Carolina. Abraham, tied for third in the N.F.L. with 12 sacks, practiced for the third straight day. abraham ¶Dolphins linebacker Joey Porter has been fined $7,500 for unsportsmanlike conduct during Miami’s 48-28 loss to New England on Sunday. The N.F.L. said Porter had been fined for verbally abusing an opponent after a play. On Wednesday, Porter apologized for not leaving the field Sunday when ordered to by Coach Tony Sparano. porter (AP).
